title: Une si longue nuit
overview: Sami is 19 years old. His life ahead of him. Everything has to be done. Everything is to live. And then one evening. Everything collapses. A bad meeting. This attractive but tortured young girl who gets in her car, who wants to go see the sea and sleep with him ... How can you resist him? And then, the drama. He wakes up, she is dead in bed. Arrested by the police, it is the descent into hell. His life is falling apart. Sami is incarcerated. His horizon is reduced to a prison cell while awaiting trial.Â
